name: Kennedy's

review:
Its a small Chinese outlet in shalimar bagh market. They don't offer service in car which is really a drawback. As fas as their sitting arrangement is concerned they have 2 tables and 5-6 chairs/stools.
Basically they are good at deliveries or you can carry yourself the stuff to your cars.

I had manchow. It was little above average.

Next i had soya drumsticks. They were crispy and tasted fine. Their drumsticks are a must try .
name: Slic Chic

review: Finally an amazing terrace in Hudson lane. The ambiance is pretty cool. I personally loved the terrace and another staircase leading a floor upwards to another little terrace. They have indoor sitting on a floor below as well. The music played is really great. The service is good. Staff is courteous. The management is overall good. Their sitting is little uncomfortable to spend more hours. The tables are high in height and difficult to comfortably eat. Coming to food - 1. Mozzarella sticks : A must try. Tasted great. The dips were finger licking. 2. Veg momos : Bad . Don't order . 3. Pizza pockets : Average 4. Blueberry shake : Too sweet to have. RECOMMENDED - mozerella...read more
name: Mama's Buoi

review:
They are at the end of model town 2 right in front of the round about.
They have
1. Golgappas
2. Tikkis
3. Pao bhaji
4. Samosa
5. Dahi bhalla
6. Chaat papri

They make everything in front of you. The shop is neat and tidy. The only flaw is they don't wear gloves.

Tikkis are my favourite here. No match in entire model town. MUST TRY !! Price - Rs. 20 per tikki

Gol gappas are good too. Price - rs 20 for four gol gappas.
name: Jugal Chaat And Caterers

review:
Few years back, their taste used to be superb. With many new bakeries in town, their taste seems to be lost in the crowd.

I lately had a truffle and a chocolate eclaire. I was really disappointed by the eclaire. I'v had so much better eclaires at other places.
The pastry too was average.
name: Anjlika

review:
I have been to this place a couple of times and never been disappointed.
I love all their pizzas , all their pastas and cant ever get over them. This is an evergreen kind of place where you can visit anytime without doubting the food standard , taste and crowd. Everything is good . Big chill is certainly one of its kind.
Happy eating :)
name: The Big Chill

review:
I came across this bakery at the grub fest. Everything looked very attractive and delectable. Since i was already full and done with my food, i could only try opera cake and trust me it was amazing. The best combination of chocolate & coffee i'v had so far. It was so soft and so tasty. I wanted to try their eclaire as well but it was either finished or not available at the fest .
A must try bakery for all the dessert lovers.

Insta - newdelhifoodblogger

Happy eating :)
name: The Bombaykery

review:
This ccd does not have a good service at all. They never have all the items mentioned in the menu.
I have been here 4 times and this is based on my personal experience.
Though whatever they serve is made well.
The place is hygienic and you usually end up getting a table for yourself easily.
name: Cafe Coffee Day

review:
Haldiram is known for quality fast food. One of the best fast food chains we have come across.

Visited this outlet a lot of times. The service is great. The staff is courteous. The place looks fine and hygienic.

I have tried a lot of things here.

1. Chilly paneer roll - wow !! Must have . Tasted really great. The filling was delectable.

2. Pani Puri - The best pani puri I have had so far.

3. Pai bhaji - Just one word " Brilliant "

4. Bhature chole - the best part was that it was very less oily. Tasted fine.

Apart from these items, I have tried a lot more. Everything's tasted good.
Happy eating.

Insta account - newdelhifoodblogger
name: Haldiram's

review:
Surely a over hyped place.
The outdoor area is nice and soothing. The interiors of the indoor are fine but the sitting is very high and uncomfortable ( specially where we were offered ).

The food is really bad specially kadhai paneer nachos. Don't order them if you go there.

The staff is courteous and the service is really good. An applaud for their servers.

If you are planning to here, go just for the feel of the place , not for the food !!
name: Tamasha

review:
Over hyped place in delhi university for momos and Chinese cuisines.
Momos very fine but there are better momos available in other joints. The garlic sauce given along was way too spicy.

Have tried a couple of Chinese things more. They too very okay. Nothing over the top.

This place is occupied during lunches almost everyday with college students. If you have not been here, do visit once.

Insta blog - newdelhifoodblogger
name: Momo's Point

review:
This is a very old and famous puri chole joint in shakti nagar. Its very occupied on sundays and you usually get 15-20 mnts waiting during breakfasts. Yes they have sitting arrangements.

Apart from puri chole, they are famous for lassi and sweets.

Personally i felt they no longer have the same charm in their puri chole which they used you have. Had it today and found it average. The mango pickle they give along is actually very tempting.

If you are in vicinity and craving for chole puri , you can visit apni dukan and enjoy your breakfast.

Insta account - newdelhifoodblogger

Happy eating :)
name: Apni Dukan

review:
I visited this place today. Its on the second as well as third floor. I went here around 3pm and the place was almost empty.

Ambiance - It is same to the other big chills.

Service - great !! Order comes in 10-15 minutes hot and organized . Staff is descent .

Food -

1. Fussili cream pasta with mushrooms - amazing !! Sufficient for two people. You cant have another dish if you are two.

2. Coffee shake - one of the best shakes i have had so far. Highly recommended.

3. Blueberry cheesecake - no !! I am not a fan of blueberry or cheesecake . I thought maybe i could like this here but no i did not like the taste.
name: The Big Chill

review:
I went to this place on a Friday night around 8pm. 80% of the sitting was occupied. Lights were dim and ambiance seemed pretty well. The music was hardly audible till 9pm. At 9, the place looked lively and appropriate for a Friday night. Choice of songs was fantastic.
Staff and the service is applaudable. I would give 10 on 10 for the guy who was in charge of looking after and serving our table.
In food, i really loved the masala fries. Their was no mayo served along so i we asked for it separately. The dip too was great.
name: Lord Of The Drinks Forum

review:
This place is small if we compare it to odeon social or hauz khas social. The ambiance is kind of cool and cosy. The sitting is a mixture of table chairs, swings with sitting and wooden stairs sitting. The steps of the staircase sitting is very uncomfortable and there is no backrest. We had a hard time sitting there for an hour.
The food is average. I had loaded nachos along with mocktails. The nachos were really bad.
The service is fine.
name: Nehru Place Social

review: Amazing pastries and tarts. Whatever i tasted here was undoubtedly finger licking. They have rich flavours and different concepts of presenting the desserts. Try their desserts if you are bored of usual black forests , truffles and vanillas. You will love them. The staff is courteous and the service delivered was applaudable.
name: L'Op√©ra Salon de Th√©

review:
I went to this place 3 days back. It was a Tuesday night. The ambiance is fine with red lighting and dark atmosphere. The crowd was really weird. There was a party going on as well with people dancing to the dj and rolling on the floor. ( literally )
Hookah was fine. In food, we had white pasta penne , though we had ordered spaghetti. It tasted good.
Next we had spring roll and they were super oily. Taste was fine but because of so much oil, we left it unfinished.
The coolers and mocktails were average.
Service is fine.
Would i visit again? No
Such loud music and darkness gives me a headache. Couldn't stay there for more than a hour.
name: Urban Hub

review: This place has been on my checklist since a long time. Finally visited this yesterday and yes i liked the place. Loved the ambiance specially how the ceiling is done. The wooden wide staircase which leads you to the junkyard cafe gives you nice vibes. The music being played was okaish. This thing could be improved. It was a saturday night and the feel was a little less. The service is quick. There is a lot of staff. Different for hookahs, different for serving and different for finding you a table. Food- 1. Smoked pepper chicken- chicken was soft. Seemed fresh. Very very spicy. Order it of you can handle the spiciness. The dish is good though. 2. Loaded nachos - we got chicken...read more
name: The Junkyard Cafe

review:
I'v been here last month for a dinner. Not much time has passed since this hotel launched . This place has rooms for the guests, a small banquet ,a restaurant area and a nice bar.
I started with soup and starters. Soup was decent in taste. In starters , i had salt and pepper , dahi kabab and mushrooms. They were perfectly cooked and tasted good .
Next i had white sauce pasta followed my main course. Pasta was amazingly made with appropriate salt added.
In main course i had dal makhni , butter chicken and butter naan. Now this was what i would call amazing mughlai.
All the best to this place !!
name: Mystique Melange

review: Wow !! I'm completely in love with this place. I was here last Saturday when Akhil ( the voice behind khaab) had come to perform. It was an amazing night there. The ambiance of the place is very catchy , calm & beautiful. The moment you enter , you feel you are in the cafes of London. The concept is very english and the place is spacious enough. The smoking area is bifurcated on one side of the lounge and even that is spacious and non congested. One bar is present there and another elongated bar running the entire length on the non smoking section. The service is fine. I could not have much to eat and taste that day because of no sitting available that day. Yes i recommend this place....read more
name: FLYP Cafe

review:
A very nice conceptual cafeteria. Looks like a very different and attractive place. More such places are needed in delhi.
Tried 3-4 items here. They were okaish with respect to the price charged. This place surely deserves a visit and yes i am coming again !!
name: Cha Bar

review:
I have tried their burgers, the three of them under the king burger section. I liked the veg burger . Rest two were fine. Nothing extraordinary about them which gives me any kind of craving to go and have them again.
Service is fast. Sitting apace is small and usually taken on weekends.
name: Kent's Fast Food

review:
I have tried 3 burgers here- chicken jelapeno , aalo achari and fenugreek .
I really liked the chicken jalapeno one. The rest too were average. I dont feel like having them again.
The quality of the burgers seem fine. The service at this outlet is good. The staff is well behaved and professional. The place looked clean .
name: Carl's Jr.

review:
This keventers outlet is located in the food court of pacific mall. The service is fine. Staff is good. The shakes and drinks taste same everywhere ofcourse. I feel the quantity of the drinks they give is very less with respect to the price . I'm sure the quality is maintained but still the quantity should be atleast 20% more.
P.S - i love their bottle.
name: Keventers - The Original Milkshake

review: This is the best ice cream parlor chain that is currently running in delhi with respect to the service, taste and keeping in mind the affordable price. I have been to this cp outlet alot of times. If you come here on weekends, the long que cant be avoided but it will be worth the wait. Their service is very fast and your turn comes in max 15-20minutes . If you visit on weekdays , que is almost half. I have never seen this place less crowded. The best part is they let you try before ordering your flavor. By this way you can be sure before you order. I have tried Anjeer, kesar pista , chocobite and coffeewalnut . I loved all of them. Completely mesmerized by their taste. I am more of a...read more
name: Naturals Ice Cream

review: I have alot of memories associated with this place because of my college nearby. Completely flawless chole bhature and kulche chole. Trust me , coudn't have been better. Both the bhatures the have , plain and potato ones are worth having. The best part for girls is that their que is separate from boys and hence a very short one. 5-7 mnts waiting would be completely worth once you have their food. If we talk about the hygiene scene, they get a point for that too. You can see the preparation in front of yourself . Their staff wears gloves and work very systematically. They service is really fast and from time to time they keep cleaning whatever 3-4 tables they have . If you have not...read more
name: Chache Di Hatti

review:
This kfc is in the food court of moment mall. They accept only cash . You don't have to stand in the line and get your card made incase you want to eat here.

The service of this particular outlet is chaotic. There are 3 machines where you can order but one was out of service. As a result of this the Que got long on the other two. 2 are not enough for handling the crowd specially on weekends . I was there on a sunday and myself could see the need of atleast one more que.

The staff is courteous . Though they made a calculation mistake in my order because of entering the wrong item.
name: KFC

review:
I went here yesterday for a very little time. The interiors are like that of a very fine dine. The lighting is strong . The place looks rich. The ambiance didn't attract me much inspite of all this. It didn't have anything extraordinary to separate it from rest of the usual lounges. The bar looks great though.
The service is amazing.
Staff is courteous.
All the best to this new place !!
name: Oh My God

review: This a two floored small cafe in h block, cp. the ground floor has billing counter and 2-3 tables for sitting . The first floor is entirely sitting area. You have to go down to give the order . The place looks fine for a burger and sides cafe . The prices are higher than the mc donalds and kfc burgers. The tikki and style of the burger is very desi. The soft drinks are available at the mrp which comes to the advantage of the cafe in terms of increasing their overall sale. If we talk about the taste, i liked the veg potato crunch burger. The bun was soft and tikki was crunchy but there was a slight smell in the oil they had used. Moroccan fries were really tasty. Do have it with a dip. I...read more
name: Burger Singh - Big Punjabi Burgers

review: Over hyped place . Maybe they used to be very good initially that is why the place has a great name. I personally didn't like it . I don't feel like eating the bhallas here again. I'v had much better bhallas at other places. I hope the food here is hygienic because there is a lot of chaos and flies around this place.
name: Natraj Dahi Bhalle Wala

review: The worst service i have ever come across. The outlet is filled with messed up staff and unhygienic atmosphere. Starting from the guy who takes the order standing on the counter in front of the screen . He is so irritating. He doesn't know how to handle the public and coordinate with the staff . He even took 4 mnts to give me back the change . Next when you enter the sitting space section , the door is too hard to push and makes an irritating sound everytime someone gets in and goes out. The space is very small , congested and suffocating. The air conditioner hardly works. They announce the order " ye burger n ye momos kisk hain? " and everyone says mere h. What the hell?...read more
name: WOW! Momo

review: It is a single floored Chinese restaurant in vijay nagar/hudsan lane. Amidst many this is one of a kind. The place looks like an ordinary restaurant. It is usually full on Saturdays and Sundays. Their service is okay. The initial order takes time. It took them 20 minutes to get the soup. After that the service took up speed or maybe because we are eating we don't mind much. I had manchow soup, steamed momos , noodles and Manchurian. I liked the soup and the noodles. Momos were not good. Manchurian would have been very fine if the salt hadn't been this much. They have great combo packages . If you are 2 people take the 1 person combo , if you are 3 , take the two person combo. The...read more
name: Shagun

review:
The place was almost empty when i reached there. Hardly a table occupied or two. Tried their shakes, jalape√±o balls with dip , chicken tikka and a dish more. The food was little above average. The service was good. The prices were on a higher side with respect to the quantity.
There was no live band , no singer , no dj , no sort of entertainment the day i went there. It was getting kind of monotonous. Still do give this place a visit for sure. Maybe the rest of days are interesting there. Happy eating :)
name: Kinbuck 2

review:
Eating corner is my favourite eating outlet in model town when it comes to the chaat papri genre. Their golgappas and pao bhaji are amazing. I even like the soya chaamp with rumali roti though its more on the spicier side. I feel it should not be so spicy as its really not good for health.
I'v also had their papri chaat and mushroom tikka. Papri chaat was tasty and mushrooms were okaish.
You would want to visit again after trying food here once.
name: Eating Corner

review:
Their service is good. The staff is courteous. Their home delivery takes 45 minutes which i think is a lot of time.
Also, one thing i don't like about subway deliveries is the paper bag in which they deliver. Its very thin and not proper. They should at use a paper carry bag or atleast a thick paper bag.
name: Subway

review:
I'v been here twice. The ambiance is very usual. If the weather is good, prefer sitting outdoor.
The service has no issues.
I liked their cream cheese maggie. The cream sauce spaghetti pasta could have been better.
name: Mocha Arthouse

review: A very different concept of serving food to people giving them a feel of a train. Its a restaurant made to look like a train with very cute baggage area above your head just you have in trains. I went there yesterday ( Sunday ) and they asked me to wait for 15 minutes. There were many other people in the waiting list. They have a lot of employees yet their follow up service is very slow. They are too occupied serving people their initial order that they get no time to come follow up the already having customers. Also, the seats are not much comfortable . The presentation of the food is innovative. I had gol gappas , chaat papri , soya te parantha , pao bhaji and kala katha chuski. Gol...read more
name: Imly

review:
Its a small bakery in model town second stop ( part 2) . They have two adjacent shops. One is for cake and pastries. The other is for snacks, cookies and breads.

There cakes are very tasty. The best in model town . Even their fondant cakes are neatly made and tastes great.

In snacks , their burgers and patties are fantabulous. Reasonably priced .Infact all items are perfect in its taste.

I deducted 1 point because of the hygiene issue. Their employees don't wear hand gloves. The one whose standing in front of the oven and warming everyone's order is never wearing his food gloves. Owner, if you are reading this pls bring this change.
name: Puri Bakers

review: Over hyped place. It takes 15-20 minutes to get a table there because of the waiting. Service is great as there as many employees. The food is good. Shakes are okaish. The feel of the place is not getting me back here. Its a place where you come, you eat and you go. Nothing else.
name: Hauz Khas Social

review:
The food here is just so awesome. Order anything and its tasty. Pizza, chilly chicken , pasta , nachos i liked everything.

The service is fast and the waiters are understanding. They listen properly and accordingly get the dishes done. They are polite and organised.

They have karaoke sometimes which makes the place interesting ofcourse.

In short, the place is not much hyped but it is good in all respects . Not a party kind of place but you can sit and chill with friends.
name: Garage Inc.

review: This is certainly my favourite lounge in hauz khas village till date. Whatever dish you order it tastes amazing. You will actually feel the good quality of the food and ingredients used while looking at the presentation and even the taste says it. I have been here alot of times. I like every item i'v had so far be it pasta, pizza , platters , hummus and pita , garlic chilli chicken and nachos . One dish i didn't like here is grilled chicken on sticks. Not even worth a try. Bad taste . The service is also great. Someone is always there to listen to you, to ask you frequently if you need anything , to try and get you a table asap when its very crowded. Mondays are very less crowded....read more
name: Raasta

review:
The only drawback here is the place is very small and you have a long Que outside . You are on the waiting list for 20-25 mnts minimum and ofcourse this irritates you and you plan to go to the next cafe.

The food is great. The service is great.
White sauce spaghetti pasta and their burgers are my favourite. Initially their baked nachos were different but the last time i went there, i didn't like them.

If you have not been here ever, this place deserve a couple of visits for sure.
name: Big Yellow Door

review: Much hyped restaurant among college students. When this was present in kamla nagar, it was awesome. Their chilly potatoes and tandoori momos were a class apart in taste . Since it has opened up in hudsan lane , the tastes are no more the same. Little declined in terms of taste. Huge space they have now. Service is good as well. Its a pocket friendly restaurant you can visit when you don't feel like going to expensive restaurants.
name: QD's Restaurant

review: They deliver to all nearby areas. Service is fine . The only drawback was the packing. I ordered two items out of which one was not properly packed. Guys you need to deliver in proper condition.
name: Subway

review: Very pocket friendly and accessible for college students. Sitting space for about 35people is there. Service is good. Personally i don't like their shawarmas'. I feel the quality is not upto the mark.
name: Shawarma Wala

review:
Their service is really slow. Catering area like Kamla nagar where huge crowds from colleges come should have more manpower and deliver fast service.
Moreover it is very small and you never get a sitting for yourself. Its always jam packed . One cant enjoy its meal in such a chaos.
name: Domino's Pizza

review:
The owner is rude, very rude. He is proudy and arrogant while talking to the customers. Ordered customised cupcakes a week back the date i required. On going there to collect i got to know they have not made them because the quantity was less. Wow. I mean you should have informed while taking the order.
The cakes and desserts are tasty but nobody wants to have them from someone that carries a lot of attitude while delivering the service.
name: Baker's Stop

review:
Its like any other bikanervala. Same menu ofcourse . Self service is what i don't like in such places. Remains very noisy because of the kids and family atmospheres. The deserts here are worth having. Give away options for weddings and other ceremonies also available in huge variety.

I really like their dal makhni and butter naan.
The raj kachori too is great. Pao bhaji is also fine but not at level with haldiram's .
If you have a tooth for south indian, this place is worth it.
name: Bikanervala

review:
Starbucks as we all know is a renowned coffee outlet . This one is based in A block , walking distance from metro station.
Personally in cold coffees, i only like their jawa chip.
In snacks, the sandwich and cheese toasts both are not worth trying.

The service is fast and good. Sitting space you don't get easily on weekends .
The place is good for meeting though on weekdays.
:)
name: Starbucks Coffee

review:
Wenger's is a famous bakery and eatery in connaught place since years. The service is fast but they they usually give stuff without warming it their oven unless you mention it.
Their vegetable cheese bouquet is to die for. Their patty too is amazing. Paneer roll is another mouth watering item of theirs.
I have deducted 1 point from 5 because of the pastry i had last time. It was red velvet. The taste was really bad and this is something not expected out of such a renowned food joint.
name: Wenger's

review: Famous for the school bunkers. Situated in the inner circle this ccd has a lot of student crowd in the morning as this is the only feasible open outlet in cp. The service is fine. Its a running coffee shop. You can drop in if you crave for coffee while in B block.
name: Cafe Coffee Day

review:
Much awaited Original Keventers has finally opened up in kamla nagar.
No sitting , only take away available. They give it in an attractive bottle with a lid which can be closed if you don't want to drink full . No hole in the lid for the straw so not to worry about it being dripping down your clothes or on the floor.
Two options of shakes available. The regular ones and the thick ones.
I personally love their shakes, Cold coffee shake being my favourite till now.
name: Keventers - The Original Milkshake

review: After hearing a lot about this place and seeing a lot of snap stories, i finally visited this place during t20. Yes there was a screening happening. The place is just like any other restrau pub in cp. The balcony is small and not very well enhanced. The food is same as that of the one in hauz khas social. The serving style is good but Ferrero rocher was bought in a weird style which made it difficult to drink. Though there is no issue in the service.
name: Odeon Social

review:
Ricos is located in the hudsan lane. College students get attracted to such pocket friendly restaurants. The ambiance is very average. The only thing you should really try here is its desserts. Waffles are made with some extra effort here. The presentation of the deserts is also done well.
By this i don't mean the food is bad . The pizzas and pastas are a must try !!
name: Ricos

review: This place is overly hyped. Food was average and quantity was very less. If you visit on a weekend you'll have to wait for minimum half an hour to get a table . Though the menu offered is interesting.
name: Farzi Cafe

review:
So my rating for this place is as follows -

Food - 8/10
Service- 9/10
Ambience - 8/10
Location-9/10

Worth a visit for sure !! Preferably if you are in early 20s.
name: Qubitos - The Terrace Cafe

review:
The best afghani soya chaps i'v had in the entire north delhi belongs here.
A lot more dishes are very tasty. Mushroom tikka being one of them.
In gravy dishes, tawa chap is the best out of all.
Its better to order online through this outlet as there is hardly any parking space in that area.
name: Wah Ji Wah
